newsitem.title: USA: Tyco "confident" of strong earnings rises.
newsitem.headline: Tyco "confident" of strong earnings rises.

text.p: Tyco International Ltd Monday said it is confident it can generate strong earnings increases for the remainder of the 1997 fiscal year.
"...We remain confident of our ability to produce strong earnings increases for the balance of the fiscal year," L. Dennis Kozlowski, Tyco's chairman and chief executive, said in a statement.

"Our excellent results this (second) quarter were provided by a combination of strong internal growth and the positive impact of the recent acquisitions we have made in each of our business segments," he added. "We are continuing to expand our market leadership position in all of our business units by market, product and geographic expansion."
The company also said its acquisition of ElectroStar Inc in January 1997 should result in further improvements for the remainder of the fiscal year.
